snippet: Juan Carlos Nunez has emerged as a key bridge between Biogenesis and a circle of professional baseball players, according to people familiar with the investigation.
abstract: Juan Carlos Nunez emerges as key bridge between Biogenesis, anti-aging clinic at center of widening sports doping scandal, and circle of professional baseball players; San Diego Padres infielder Everth Cabrera, suspended for 50 games for violating MLB's anti-doping rules, says Nunez, an interpreter who worked for his agent, introduced him to clinic's owner, who prescribed banned substances to him and at least 11 other players.
lead_paragraph: Juan Carlos Nunez has emerged as a key bridge between Biogenesis and a circle of professional baseball players, according to people familiar with the investigation.

headline.main: Between Players and Doping, a Valet Seen as a Middleman
headline.print_headline: Between Players and Doping, A Valet Seen as a Middleman
